Header: Digambaram to take a decision on the 5th
Content: Minister Palani Digambaram says that if the government does not take measures to further increase the basic salary of estate workers, they will take a decision on the 5th. At the discussion held yesterday under the patronage of the Prime Minister, it was decided to postpone gazetting the agreement signed to increase estate workers salary to 700 Rupees, until the 5th.
